text: Can shared at muckfest. The beer is a hazy gold with a white head of foam. Tropical fruit, juicy funk and jolly rancher raspberry notes. Sour and fruity taste. Medium body and medium carbonation. One of the stars of the event.

Tap @ Mikkeller Beer Celebration 2017  
Double Passionfruit Gose. 
Żółty, całkowicie mętny trunek. Gęsty jak krem, lub nektar marchwiowo-brzoskwiniowy. Wspaniała biała piana. MARAKUJA NA MAKSA! Genialne! Rewelacyjnie pachnie, wygląda, a jeszcze lepiej smakuje. Początkowo kwaskowate od marakui, po kilku łykach i ogrzaniu w dłoniach staje się bardziej słodkie. Na ostatniej prostej można wyczuć dosłownie szczyptę soli. Soczystość na najwyższym poziomie. Gładkie, super pijalne, sesyjne. Mógłbym takich kilka pod rząd wypić. Jedno z najlepszych jasnych Ale na festiwalu.
Backlog z Mikkeller Beer Celebration Copenhagen 2017. Najlepsze Gose ever. Totalnie owocowe i tropikalne, czysty wyciąg z marakui. Miłość.
MBCC. Hazy yellow with small off-white head. Aroma is malt, fruit, orange and passion fruit. Flavour is malt, fruit, orange, passion fruit, fruit peel, juicy, little citric and a little sour.
From tap at MBCC 2017. A hazy golden coloured beer with white head. Aroma and flavour of yeast, spice, fuit, salt and passionfruit.
MBCC. Hazy golden with a white head. Aroma is sweet, malty, heavy citrus and tart. Flavor is medium sweet and moderate acidic. Dry and moderate acidic finish. 120517

Sample at Mikkeller Beer Celebration Copenhagen 2017, blue session. Really hazy, opaque peach color with off-white head. Aroma pops with intense passionfruit, almost like straight juice. Taste is sour, fruity, dry, astringent, really refreshing.

From tap. Hazy yellow golden with white head. Fruity aroma, tropical fruits, passion-fruit, citrusy, grass, wheat. Tart fruity and light sweet taste. Light to medium thin to oily body with soft carbonation.
[5/12/17] Draught at Mikkeller Beer Celebration Copenhagen 2017. Blue session. Cloudy yellow. Great juicy tropical fruits, tart, lactic, so juicy, light to medium-bodied. Great.
Mbcc blue. Yellow hazy. Citrus tropical, passion fruity nose. Clean fruity. Niceish. Light med bodied, pretty intense fruityness. Nice acidity, longish finish. Quite nice. Summer sipper.

Can. Theres more aroma to this than Old Spice on Magnum PI; shits packed with copious nasal units of passionfruit aromatics! One of the best aromas Ive whiffed this year. Taste is YUGE passionfruit sweet with some lacto notes, med-high lemony sourness, little bit of saltiness. Overall: to summarise Id like to borrow a verse from Drakes latest ear clanger - "Passionfruit from miles away"
Sample at MBCC 2017. Hazy yellow with a white head. Aroma and taste of passion fruit, pineapple, light funk and some grass. Soft and easy to drink.

Can 4/21/17. Cloudy yellow orange with no head. Aroma is tropical and citrius. Passion fruit nectar. Taste is very tart. Passionfruit, kiwi, lemon. Sour and sweet. Intense flavor. Very tasty. Miami madness Jr.
Sample @ MBCC, Blue session. Cloudy yellow pour with a small head. Notes of passion fruit, passion fruit, some light funk, passion fruit, passion fruit and light lime.
Keg at cbc17 Blue... Hazy amber.. Small white lacing.. Big fresh pinnapple and passion fruit nose.. Sharp bitter passion fruit.. Like with the seeds and every thing
Tap @ MBCC 2017. Aromas of huuuuge passionfruit, mango, lemony, lactose. Taste is just a lactic passionfruit mango BOMB. Not complex in any way but so so good.

Tap into a snifter showing lightly filtered hazy orange with a finger of clean white foam. 

The nose shows a lot of rich juicy passion fruit. 

The palate is moderately carbonated and light bodied. Lightly tart with flavors of lightly acetic passionfruit throughout. Finish is a lingering acidity with a light brinyness and more passionfruit.
Sampled at Mikkeller Beer Celebration Copenhagen 2017. Hazy orange pour with a white head. Tons of passion fruit, lightly sor, super fruity, so delicious.
Draft - Tons of fruity passion notes. Murky yellow gold. Sour passion with salty clean finish. Tart and dry.
Tap @MBCC2017, Blue Session. Murky yellow, white froth. Juicy pineapple and lemon aroma. Sweetish flavour, pineapple, gooseberries, papaya.
Tap @ MBC 2017. Pour golden with a white head. Aroma of passionfruits, citrusy, salty, sweet notes of passionfruits again . ripe fruits. Very sour with passionfruits and salt.

Sampled @ Mikkeller Beer Celebration 2017, Blue Session. Sehr trübes hell goldgelbes Bier. Geruch ist mild säuerlich, limetten, grüner Tee, Aprikosen. Geschmack nach Aprikosen, mild säuerlich, grapefruit, Saft.

Tap, mbcc, blue. 
Hazy golden, thick white head. 
Aroma has citric notes, passion fruit. 
Very tart juicy pulp. Light but kinda refreshing.
Tap at MBCC2017, Copenhagen. Color is cloudy golden with small white head. Aromas and flavors: Tartness, berries, rhubarb and some sweetness.
Draft. An unclear golden beer with s white head. The aroma has notes of lemons, straw, and elderflowers. The flavor is lemons, lacto, straw, and elderflowers, leading to atart finish.
From tap. Pours hazy orange with a small white head. Arma is smooth fruity. Vague vanilla note. Sweet, mild peschy fruity. Mellow, juicy. Crisp citrusy and peachy fruity into the finish.

From notes. Enjoyed at Corbets house warming on April 23. 16 oz can. I love the all pink can. The pour on this is a thicker cloudy golden yellow with a thin white head that vanishes quickly without any lace. The aroma is out of control. The fruitiness, the tartness, a hint of wheat, a great juiciness. Fuck me. This is awesome. This is like a slightly tart passion fruit juice. My god. The flavor is even better. The tartness just leaves, with a bright fruit juice and tart sourness taking over. There is a hint of salt to it, but that just balances the juiciness and the lovely fruit. Jesus this is just incredible. The mouth feel is light and crisp with a bright carbonation and a lingeringly juicy and tart crisp aftertaste. I could drink this by the gallon. Fuck me.

Can, pours a murky orange color. This is straight up juice, like actual juice, not the overused classification of gross, modern IPAs. Heavy passionfruit, salt, and dank grapefruits. Sour and sweet throughout each sip. Passionfruit guts and slime in the close. Medium body. One of the better veils I have had but I do love passionfruit.

On tap at the Veil anniversary. Pours a cloudy yellow gold with medium white head that diminishes quickly. The aroma is intense passionfruit, wheat, guava. Thin body, very juicy, passionfruit, light salt, good balance of sour, really enjoyed this one.
